amendment.description: To provide additional transparency and accountability in funding for conferences and meetings of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3318 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3318 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S12847; text: CR S12847) To provide additional transparency and accountability in funding for conferences and meetings of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3318 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3318 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Coburn.
